messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Before I challenge the Pokémon Gym
Leader, I’ll test my strength on you!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I guess it means I’m not ready for
the Gym challenge yet...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I guess if you don’t have a single
Gym Badge, you’re a total nobody...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’m about ready to challenge the
Pokémon Gym Leader.But before I do, let me test my
strength on you again!
